name: Exocet Blast Off
overview: In the depths of space, no man is safe. It is a galaxy of the unknown, a world of unimaginable peril and drama where sight and sound are distorted by the vastness of the stars. Exploring distant worlds is the last area of adventure for mankind. You are one of these great adventurers. In Exocet Blast Off, the galaxy itself seems to be poised, ready to strike out at you, to make an example of invaders of its space. The deadly barrage of galactic missiles whirr past your ship, as you utilize every ounce of skill and training as a pilot.
